trans-unit.source: The mysterious purpose of two of the rings had eluded Esper mages—until now.
trans-unit.target: 那两环的神秘效能始终困扰着艾斯波法师～直到现在为止。

trans-unit.source: In a world where death is always violent, cruel weapons are as common as rocks.
trans-unit.target: 在死状向来惨烈的世界中，各式残酷武器就如石头般四处可见。

trans-unit.resname: CON·136 | Font of Mythos | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Those who drink from Malfegor's cup are tainted with hunger and stained with lies.
trans-unit.target: 自墨非葛杯中饮水者，都被饥饿与谎言所感染。

trans-unit.source: Once broken, who knows what worlds might grow from its shards?

trans-unit.source: Those who dismiss the cylix as an ordinary wooden bowl are blind to the true measure of its worth.
trans-unit.target: 只把这钵当成一般木头碗的人，都无法查知其真正价值所在。

trans-unit.source: Ancient Ziggurat
trans-unit.target: 远古金塔庙

trans-unit.source: Built in honor of Alara's creatures, the ziggurat vanished long ago. When Progenitus awakened, the temple emerged again.
trans-unit.target: 金塔庙原是建造来荣耀阿拉若的生物，早已消失多年。 在祖神兽苏醒后，它们再度出现。

trans-unit.source: "It was a strange morning. When we awoke, we found our trees transformed. We didn't know whether to water them or polish them."\n—Pulan, Bant orchardist
trans-unit.target: 「那是个奇怪的早晨。 我们醒来时，就发现树变了样子。 不晓得该要替它浇水还是把它擦亮。」 ～班特栽果人普兰

trans-unit.source: The goblins went to sleep in Jund and awoke in Grixis. They'd never seen a zombie before. They would never see one again.
